channel.title: OFFICIAL BLACK MESA SCREENSHOT COMPETITION?
channel.description:
It's been a while since the OFFICIAL BLACK MESA SCREENSHOT COMPETITION has started, and I'm wondering why it has been abandoned. No results, no new updates, nothing. And also, the "Official Screenshot Contest Questions / Comments" thread is closed, so I/we can't even post questions about it. That's why I made a new thread.
If you're wondering what I'm talking about, here's the official thread:
[url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=14898']OFFICIAL BLACK MESA SCREENSHOT SUBMISSIONS FORUM[/url]
Or am I missing something maybe? D:
P.S.: if this is the wrong section, please let me know or move this thread to the correct section, please. I couldn't find a better section to post this.

item.title: OFFICIAL BLACK MESA SCREENSHOT COMPETITION?
item.dc:creator: Alberto309
item.description:
PCGameCrazy:

You might want to fix the links to yrr’s 3 screenshots. They’re redirecting me to the Steam Community home page.

Edit: Anyway, your screenshot is really cool.

Ops, my bad. I didn’t noticed that the links here are not fully shown, so I just made “CTRL+C” instead of “Copy link”. I’ve fixed the links now, thank you for letting me know and for the screenshot compliments. Much appreciated!

And, yeah, I think pretty much the same thing. A new competition should be unnecessary, and I also agree with [COLOR=‘RoyalBlue’]Dotard.
But if someone of you want to share some cool shots anyway, I’ll be happy to take a look at them (and probably someone else also, of course).

Read full topic

item.title: OFFICIAL BLACK MESA SCREENSHOT COMPETITION?
item.dc:creator: Dotard
item.description:
Another competition or any community project before the 2nd release would make sense tho.

Read full topic

item.title: OFFICIAL BLACK MESA SCREENSHOT COMPETITION?
item.dc:creator: D3lta
item.description:
I honestly don’t think it’s necessary to make it a competition, since most competitors were users browsing the forums during the month of release, and later left (and most likely the reason Max locked his thread).

Read full topic

item.title: OFFICIAL BLACK MESA SCREENSHOT COMPETITION?
item.dc:creator: Alberto309
item.description:
danielsangeo:

I’d say, as a moderator, let’s have this thread be the Black Mesa screenshot thread. I don’t know if there’s any sort of official competition going on, but I’d say that if you have screenshots of Black Mesa you’d like to submit, let’s see them!

Well, I’ve already posted my screenshot in the competition back in the day.
This:

Why do I have to launch another competition? If the original first competition is probably died, then I do not need to know more I guess. Just waiting a confirm from someone that knows for sure is died.

I also saw that [COLOR=‘Navy’]yrr also participated with these 3 links:

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=100745491
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=100772867
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96317839

EDIT: Links fixed

He provided some cool screens for sure. :3

@Dotard:

Well, that’s pretty sad then.

But anyway, if you feel that this thread should be a new Screenshots Thread, that I’m ok with it.

Post your shots folks!

Read full topic

item.title: OFFICIAL BLACK MESA SCREENSHOT COMPETITION?
